snippet: The company announced plans to close the huge military operation and eliminate jobs there by the end of 2013 to cut costs.
abstract: Boeing will close its military airplane plant in Wichita, Kan, laying off many of the 2,160 workers over next two years; will shift as many 1,400 jobs to other plants; layoffs represent Pentagon push to cut costs.
lead_paragraph: The company announced plans to close the huge military operation and eliminate jobs there by the end of 2013 to cut costs.

headline.seo: Boeing to Shut Wichita Plant, Citing Cuts at Pentagon
headline.main: Boeing to Shut Wichita Plant, Citing Cuts at Pentagon
headline.print_headline: Boeing to Shut Wichita Plant, Citing Cuts at Pentagon
